Class Date

java.lang.Object
eventorganizer.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class defines a Date for an Event
Author:
Patryk Dziedzic, Aveesh Patel

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if this Date object is a valid calendar date. - year must be in range - month must be in range - day must be in range for the corresponding month - February must be at most 29 if it is a leap year, 28 otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the Date object is valid, false otherwise

    • validYear

      private boolean validYear()
      Checks if this Date object's year is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the year is after 1900

    • validMonth

      private boolean validMonth()
      Checks if this Date object's month is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the month is between 1 and MAX_MONTH

    • validDay

      private boolean validDay()
      Checks if this Date object's day is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the day is valid for the corresponding month

    • isLeap

      private boolean isLeap()
      Checks if this date object's year is a leap year.
      Returns:
      true if it is a leap year, false otherwise
